description: Here at Goonhammer, we know that it’s hard to keep track of all the news happening all the time in the games industry. So much is always going on with games of all sorts, and their related media, it can be a real blink-and-you’ll miss it situation.  That’s why every week, we round up five […]
title: Games Industry News Roundup- December 3rd, 2024

description: Welcome back to my mini-series on the smaller skirmish form of Conquest: First Blood. Through this, I’m going over how the game plays and each faction that you can place on the table, their strengths and weaknesses, and how to field them. Today we will take you back to a time where the glory of […]
title: Conquest First Blood Faction Focus: Old Dominion

description: We talk about the missions and rules from the 2024 Grand Narrative and how you can adapt them to your campaign to be a bit more workable and balanced.
title: The Narrative Forge: Fixing the Rules and Missions of the Grand Narrative

description: You may have noticed a few new names appearing under out Old World articles over the last couple of months and that’s no mistake: we’re a bigger team! We’ll be continuing coverage for The Old World as new Arcane Journals are released and to talk about strategies and what’s-going-on with the game as a whole. […]
title: Warhammer The Old World: Our New Landing Page!

description: Stephanie goes a-Rumbling in the Ribble, hoping to defend her Best Varangur crown in an uncommonly packed field!
title: Rumble in the Ribble: Kings of War Event Report

description: We take a deep dive into the Tyranid Warriors-powered Warrior Bioform Onslaught Detachment - how it works and how to play it.
title: Detachment Focus: Warrior Bioform Onslaught

description: Troy and Ty gather in advance of the Thanksgiving Holiday to discuss not only their favorite dishes but also a few of their other gaming/hobby-related favorites. The episode brings a few updates on the hobby plans for winter, a brief review of reading progress, and some discussion around the games that have been played. You […]
title: Playin and Slayin #85 | A Few of Our Favorite Things

description: Travis and Jason chat with Dan, who won the World Champions of Warhammer event. Topics include: Warp Coven tactics, as well as Imperial Navy Breachers. title: JAKTP 101: World Champion Tips, Mastering Warp Coven & Finding Fun with Imperial Navy Breachers!
